page.description: Enter in the 'Bubble help' property to provide bubble help for the label control.

figure.title: Bubble help on a Label control

section.note: This bubble help shows up when you hover over the control itself, represented by a line in this case. The text in this example is defined in the Field Label section of the properties list. This section also contains its own bubble help property, which appears when you highlight over the Field Label text "Label1".
